attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my president. My lord and savior Donald J Trump. BUT THIS APP IS HORRIBLE. i found out that he is a hom0phobe along with being racist and EVEN A RAPIST.. He definitely lost mine and my family of 15 vote... :((( EXTEREMELY disappointing and disgusted by this app. if i could i would give it a 0 out of 5 stars!! Donald Trump lost My vote along with my 8, 21 year old sons and my 2, year old daughters and my Husband, Wife, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, my 4 sisters, my 6 brothers, my 10 nieces and my 15 nephews REFUSE to vote for him in this upcoming election! that's a total of 51 votes that you have lost!

attributes.title: HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see the great things that our cheeto president had in store for us . i was also told that if i downloaded this app that i would receive one of those lil house hippos  but i soon came to a sad realization that IT WAS A LIE . also every time i open the app to see the amazing things this app was to bring , it crashed and it made my phone power off 😿😿😿 i do NOT recommend this app bc you will not see great things from our president on here and sadly you will not receive a house hippo 👁💧👄💧👁

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 but on a grave stone 🌈✨😌✌🏽🧚🏻‍♂️🙈🌸
attributes.review:
I opened the app and as soon as I did it started to glitch don’t get me wrong I LoVE trump but not the app it’s just not good you should take it off the App Store I can’t believe how this app is so not good my children should not have to go through the pain of having to look at this mans crusty dusty musty orange 🍊 face I would give it a 0 ⭐️ if I could I can’t believe I have to take the time out of my day to do this this is so frustrating I was just trying to get some trump merchandise WOW 
 TRUMP 2020 but on a grave stone 🌈✨😌✌🏽🧚🏻‍♂️🙈🌸

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: honestly it took so long to download and immediately when I opened the app I was forced to look at a sign up screen. why would I give my information to this app why can’t I stay informed without my personal identifications being involved? the audacity. also it just looks ugly. who in the hecky designed this app. it ruins the aesthetic of my phone because it clashes with my background. this app has offended me so deeply that I think it should be removed from the store. anyways, anyonebuttrump2020 💋✨

attributes.title: worst app!
attributes.review: so firstly getting into the app i learn i have to give my private information away in order to even access the app. this is a violation of my rights which trump said he would protect. the wording is too small and i can’t actually read any of the important information the app is trying to provide. in turn it’s not a useful app. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE!! THEN I TRY TO POST A REVIEW AND I CANT BECAUSE ALL THE NAMES ARE TAKEN! this is either a problem with the app store or this app but either way it’s not right and trump needs to be held accountable!

attributes.title: This App is Horrible
attributes.review: So I decided to download this app because I was bored and wanted to see what was big deal about this app. However it take forever download and I didn’t real feel like sitting there for more than 20 minute. And then when it actually downloaded it kick me off the app when I clicked on it. Now because of that my guinea pig who’s name is Juan is now dead because of this stupid app. Also aliens have taken over my house and are holding my family captive and I am hiding under my bed so thanks!!!!🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP IT WILL BREAK YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: If I could give zero stars, I would. As soon as I  downloaded it, I gave Trump my phone number and was subsequently flooded by spam calls and concerning texts. One in particular was threatening to harm me and all members of my family if I was not a cis, straight, white male. 0/10 never affiliating with this orange dictator again. Also, my phone began to constantly crash whether I was in the app or not, no matter how much I restarted my phone, and it became unresponsive. This software is very damaging, DO NOT GET THIS APP IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR PHONE.

attributes.title: Gave me depression and lost brain kells
attributes.review: Before this app I was a happy person, always singing and dancing and treating others with the upmost kindness and sincerity a person has to offer. I was scrolling on the AppStore and saw this lovely app, thinking it could contribute to my never ending goal of spreading kindness ✨I downloaded. But as soon as I did I was filled with hatred and anger and ~racism~. I was no longer the person I used to be 😥. Immediately I deleted the app and felt myself returning to kindness and good morals. I think this app is haunted and should be IMMEDIATELY deleted

attributes.title: this app will kill you and your dog
attributes.review: This app is horrible and scary when i first opened it i was confused and my eyes started to burn from seeing an ompa loompa and a big fat cheeto at the same time. I then showed my dog and she was so scared she tried to run i front of a bus and now has to avoid anything orange according to the doctor or she will be traumatized. I hope jesus can give me my sight back because i had to make my mom write this. I tried to get my dad to do it but he opened the app saw the awful fat creature and then went blind as well.
